name: 物理化學實驗（一）
description: 使學生熟悉化學實驗技巧，並且與課本基本原理能互相驗證。
goals: To establish basic knowledge of physical chemistry lab
To solve problem of this topic
To conduct independent thinking on this topic
syllabus:
1.Partial molar volume (了解partial quanity概念)

2.Heat capcity ratios for gases(利用絕熱膨脹過程探究Heat capacity ratios，並能運用分子自由度關係推論Cv)

3.Binary solid-liquid phase diagram(了解固液相平衡及相圖)

4.Solubility of ionic salt by titration(探究ionic strength 和common ion effect 及salt effect間關係)

5.Acid Dissociation Constant of Methyl Red(運用Uv-Vis探究Methyl Red的Ka)

6\. Viscosity of Polymer Solution(黏度計的使用及了解黏度測定探究高分子

分子量與聚合度)

7\. Adsorption from Solution(了解表面吸附原理)

8. Standard electrode potential
